title: T206 Rare Tolstoi back - Lot of 12 -SOLD
author: darkhorse9

posts.post_title: T206 Rare Tolstoi back - Lot of 12 -SOLD
posts.post_content:
I am looking to do a little liquidating and am offering a seldom seen lot of a dozen T206 with the rare Tolstoi backs (Russian mouthpiece not included)

Scan is included below of fronts and backs. I am asking $400 for the lot. My preference is to sell them as one lot. I might consider very strong offers for individual cards.

Included in the group are:
Bill Abstein
Bill Carrigan
Josh Clark (Columbus)
Paul Davidson
Patsy Dougherty (Arm In Air)
Ray Demmitt (N.Y. Amer)
Larry Doyle (N.Y. Natl portrait)
Tim Jordan (Brooklyn batting)
Harry Krause (pitching)
Chief Meyers
Rube Oldring (Batting)
Lee Tannehill (Chicago Tannehill on front)

PM with questions.
